statement.text: A higher target FICO<sup>®</sup> Score 8 of 699 could be met within 12 months with the following actions:

actions.text: Pay all your bills on time for 12 months.
Stay current on your payments so that your most recent delinquency ages to 1 year, 4 months.
Do not open any new accounts, so that the time since your most recently opened account ages to 2 years.
Do not open any new accounts, so that your average length of established history ages to 5 years, 8 months.
Continue to make your monthly installment loan payments on time to reduce the total installment loan balances of $69,428 you owe.
Do not apply for any new credit.
